attributes.action: RECONSIDER PAYOUTS TO TERRORISTS FROM THE 'TROUBLES' UNDER THE BRADLEY/EAMES SCHEME
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I propose that the government reconsider this proposal, which would lay open old wounds and cause resentment between the two main fractions during the 'The Troubles'. Will it include all the families of the Armed Forces personnel who lost their lives, the policemen & women or indeed the families of any innocents?

I implore you Prime Minister to seriously consider revoking this waste of an already beleaugered taxpayers money

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
